title: Presenting Alt.Latino: Omar Apollo on the power of inclusion
description: From our friends at NPR's Alt.Latino, Anamaria Sayre sits down with R&B darling Omar Apollo to talk about his experiences growing up in Indiana and becoming a role model for queer Latinx kids.
